Package com.google.publicalerts.cap.profile.us

Class Ipaws1Profile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.publicalerts.cap.CapXmlParser
      • com.google.publicalerts.cap.profile.AbstractCapProfile
        • com.google.publicalerts.cap.profile.us.Ipaws1Profile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CapProfile
    public class Ipaws1Profile
extends AbstractCapProfile
    US FEMA Integrated Public Alert and Warning System CAP Profile, version 1.

    Most of these checks are not possible to represent with an XSD schema.

        public Ipaws1Profile​(boolean strictXsdValidation)
        Parameters:
        strictXsdValidation - if true, perform by-the-spec XSD schema validation, which does not check a number of properties specified elsewhere in the spec. If false (the default), attempt to do extra validation to conform to the text of the spec.

      • validate

        public Reasons validate​(AlertOrBuilder alert)
        Description copied from interface: CapProfile
        Checks the given alert against the profile and returns a collection of:
        • errors explaining how the alert does not match the profile,
        • recommendations and best-practices recommended by the profile to improve the alert.

        The profile should assume that the given alert is valid CAP and check only the extra constraints it specifies.

        An alert not adhering to the recommendations and best-practices would still be accepted by whatever system that claims to require alerts adhering to the profile, but adopting the recommendations allows for more full compatibility and perhaps extra features.

        Parameters:
        alert - the alert to validate
        Returns:
        errors and recommendations found during the validation, an empty collection if there are none
